name: Centaurus
description:
The Etherium Empire has just shown it's new capital ship, The Centaurus, to the galaxy. It only has one purpose, to coerce the galaxy as a whole  under the Empire's iron fist. You are Lance Sandalia, a lone rebel against the Empire. Gathering information from various sources, you find out the location of the Centaurus. Determined to stop the incoming massacre at all costs, you must destroy that ship.

How to win: Destroy all the turrets

Controls:

Space - Accelerate

Q & E - Roll

A & D - Yaw

W & S - Pitch

LMB - Shoot Lasers

RMB - Shoot Missiles

Credits:

Programming and Art: Moshe Kashlinsky

Music: Andrew (andrew man) Wilson 

Font Credits: HaloGen by PixelSurplus & ProLamina by Alejandro Cabrera Avila

Texture Credits: Metal Seamless Texture by jojo-ojoj
